name: BAD RNG (internetpaulicy)
description:
Hello. I made this game for Ludum Dare 38.

It is centipede but I have made it a bit easier. You can shoot in all 4 directions and you have a bomb that you can drop.

The game supports keyboard input. WASD to move, space to shoot and Q to use a bomb. Be sure to try shooting your own bomb ;)
